name: TARIRO
challenge: My client needed a developer to fulfill a design that she already wonderfully designed, she asked for it to be simple, and composed mostlty of photos.
solution: We collaborated and came to the final product, with a minmal amount of pages and a really good looking website.
results: The website came out very well, and the client was satisfied.

name: TIAGO
challenge: My client who is a wonderful young graphic designer and photographer, needed a website portfolio for all his wonderful work, he gave me full design freedom.
solution: A colour pallete and a font selection later and we came up with this design that he really liked.
results: The client was very satisfied and even left an excellent testimonial.

name: IMAAN'S
challenge: Imaan is an extraodinary cape town photographer with enourmous talent, she wanted a website that connected with her photography style and `Cape Town` vibe.
solution: I had this idea of adding beautiful flower vectors and she loved it! Her photos complimented the site so well and it was safe to say that she got what she wanted.
results: Imaan said that it was all she hoped for and she loved it, she is a great photographer and kind person!

name: BLACK INK
challenge: Hassan wanted a classic good looking tattoo website design that would capture the style of his tattoos and his overall hard work and passion!
solution: He sent me some designs that he liked and I worked my magic, black background and a super cool font.
results: He really liked the design and is ready for developement.

name: BRANDLINK
challenge: Kundani needed a single page website that needed to sum up his influencer marketing business.
solution: We collaborated and came to this great final product that was simple and stunning, effects and design were very crucial aspects of this project.
results: Kundani was more than satisfied with this website.

name: LM
challenge: Lungelo, a wonderfull and talented photographer in South Africa, need a website that would capture all his exciting work.
solution: I came up with a simple but popular design that capture his photo skills in this image heavy website.
results: Lungelo was very happy with this website and how it came out.

name: MITAKON
challenge: Michael, a very intellectual and clever business man needed a website for his business, he had a business portfolio ready to go, all that needed to happen was to keep the brands identity the same throughout.
solution: With many meetings and careful curation of the content we came up with one of my most favourite websites.
results: The website came out great and is ready for scaling and all the plans Michael has in store for Mitakon Innovation.

name: FEMS
challenge: My client needed a website that would match his business and that would look good for his target market.
solution: With collaboration we came up with this wonderful design that is eye catching and is informational.
results: The client was very satisfied and even gave a great testimonial.
